website_summaries.verdict: Though other vests offer more weight, they can't top this model when it comes to practicality and affordability.
pros: A straightforward design suitable for men and women
of weight and comfortable fit for more users
cons: Though it fits most consumers comfortably, those with larger chests may find it snug

customer_reviews.title: Weight pellets leaked within 30 min
customer_reviews.text: This item was used less than 30 min until the stitching started to separate and the weight pellets leaked out. The pellets are not housed in a separate package so they freely leaked out quickly. The vest was not used for anything that would have placed extra force to the unit. For the cost of the unit, I do not see it being worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Deeter

customer_reviews.title: Not as good
customer_reviews.text: This might be a good price but no less than a week there were small rips and now it leaks small weights that give it weight. Had to tape up to stop weights from spilling out.
customer_reviews.author: L. Leon III

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Stylish, and Weighted...but not actually 12lbs as listed.
customer_reviews.text: [Pros]: • Weighted (obviously; balanced throughout) • Comfortable + Flexible, durable, and breathable material + Pretty small/thin; could wear it under sweatshirts, hoodies, jackets, etc. + Easy to move around in • Stylish + Reflective lining + Back pouch to store small items like MP3 players or Smartphones • Unisex + Fits comfortably for both men and women ---------------------------------- [Cons]: • Not actually 12lbs - Product Description even tells you that the shipping weight is 11.2lbs. - Weigh it by itself or with it on and it's near 10-11lbs - Could it vary? Possibly, but if your buying into 12lbs you should always get 12lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sway L

customer_reviews.title: not the bulky looking flak jacket look
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new weighted vest. I am wearing it when I am walking, using the elliptical or just wearing when I am home gardening. I am average height (5'4") and average weight (150) and it is very comfortable for me to wear. I wear it over my workout tank. I like that they added a piece of fabric under the buckle to keep it from pinching or poking where it clasps on my chest. I have had several people at the gym and work ask me where I purchased. They liked that it is not the bulky looking flak jacket look.
customer_reviews.author: Chelea L. Holdt

customer_reviews.title: Not great for big guys, otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of investigating weighted vests because I'm a big guy, currently at 260. This is not a good vest for bigger guys. I 'could' wear it as advertised but it was uncomfortable and I felt silly. I actually do use it from time to time in my hiking pack to add weight to my hikes. For that it does just fine and I'm surprised at how impactful adding this relatively low amount of weight can be on a 4+ mile hike.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Moersfelder

customer_reviews.title: Weight vest didn't last long used it two to three ...
customer_reviews.text: Weight vest didn't last long used it two to three times a week for jogging on treadmill. After 2-3 weeks the vest started getting a rusted look and slowly the vest started drop the sand and I am not able to use it anymore without leaving a trail.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great item, great value. 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I first saw the design on a site that targets females and jacks up all their prices Bc everything is pink... it was 8lbs and $99.00 this one is 1 or 12 lbs, I can remember, matches more, and was less than $35. Anyway, it fots like a glove- I run with it in in 90+ degree weather in the deserts of TX and I haven’t felt like it’s made the heat worse, it’s very comfortable, the weight distribution and materials are the key here. Very very minor inner arm chaffing when wearing a tank top rather than a sleeved shirt, but an easy fix. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Front strap problem.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this vest for an active workout or for running. The vest is comfortable but the location of the front strap is to high, should be located lower to keep it from moving while running or doing an active workout. Also the front strap does not stay closed, comes loose while running or doing a workout. Vest would work for walking or doing squats. Just started loosing pellets, had to use Shoe Goo on the small holes.
customer_reviews.author: active67460

customer_reviews.title: Arrived ripped
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast , on time ! But when I opened it up and tried it on , a lot of the little balls that are in the vest fell out . I looked around the vest and there's one stitching areas that fell apart . Seems like an awesome vest , good quality, but there's really no point in it if it is ripped
customer_reviews.author: Awan Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Worth the feeling
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be walking around with a weighted blank to comfort me. So I found this perfect item to help my nervous system reset itself. It brings a calm feeling to my normal day. Now add it to my wood trail walking routine and got that extra strengthen training I was seeking for my mindful walking. I love to find mindful movement in my everyday life. This vest, is comfortable and wraps well and stays where it needs to. I keep it in a ziplock bag when I am not using it, as to keep it clean. I wish it had a little cloth vest to keep it cleaner, especially once summer hits and it's touching more of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia L.

customer_reviews.title: Weighted Vest a Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was recently diagnosed with osteoporosis and read that wearing a weighted vest while power walking or working out helps with building new bone. I thought I would give it a try. For the first few days you can definitely feel the extra workout this vest gives your muscles and joints. I don't know if this will actually help my bones, but I feel this gives me an edge with workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I mean its pretty good for the price, but the middle chest strap can be uncomfortable for women (my wife can't clip it) or men with wide chests (me) also you need more than one strap, only one is not enough. Those things aside, weight distribution is fine, it hasn't ripped or anything so its good to go
customer_reviews.author: Jorge M.

customer_reviews.title: Superhuman Gains
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I dont ever wash it and it doesn't stank. I use it for all exercises. From pull ups, push ups, squats, planks, tricep dips, chest arm dips etc. It's very versitle. I've also jogged with it. I wouldnt be surprised if you could wear it to a martial arts class without slowing down too much. I haven't experienced any wear or leaks like others. It's durable, but then again I handle it with care.
customer_reviews.author: Antar Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for any fit individual, beginner or advanced
customer_reviews.text: Great vest. The straps are very comfortable, and the sand is distributed evenly across the entire vest so it literally can be worn for HOURS without discomfort. I wore it at work once and only started to get a LITTLE uncomfortable around hour 7. The fabric wicks sweat very well and hasn't adopted my body odor at all! Very surprised to see that. I wore it to a kickboxing class as well. A+, would recommend. The vest includes a small mesh pouch on the back for carrying small items. I haven't used it, but it would certainly come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Rayner

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm was very happy with this product until about a month ago at which time it started to leak the little beads. I've only had it 5 months, used it once a week for 45 minutes while I was on stairmaster. When not in use it is store in my back seat, no reason for this to happen
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is very comfortable. I used it while doing American Ninja Warrior ...
customer_reviews.text: About 10 different seems have torn apart at different times causing the small metal ball barrings to fall out. Otherwise it is very comfortable. I used it while doing American Ninja Warrior Obstacle Training. Didnt restrict movement or flop around at all.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: yet comfortably conformed to your body
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the uncomfortable heavier 60 lb vests that constantly move around, this 12 lb vest is tightly, yet comfortably conformed to your body. I am able to do body weight exercises, life weights, run, etc, while the vest remains securely fastened. This is personally my favorite weighted vest on amazon and would highly recommended it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I was actually pleasantly surprised by the quality of this item, and I already had reasonably high expectations. It fits incredibly well on me (I'm 6'0" and 185-190.), the adjustable strap makes it slightly snugger but not by much, and it really isn't much of an issue because it rests well on the shoulders. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pali

customer_reviews.title: Weighted Vest
customer_reviews.text: only 12# weighted vest; feels kind of fragile since it is filled with sand. do not get soaked wet. don ontop of shirt and not on skin.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: vest fits nice and snug gives you that little extra when you ...
customer_reviews.text: vest fits nice and snug gives you that little extra when you work out. doesnt look bad if you where under clothes when going out to work out.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Product guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: The vest itself is an amazing product and it works to really kick your butt even in everyday activities like cleaning your house. I did have a minor issue with fraying and a seam busted and the filling spilled out, but it was resolved immediately and they have already sent me out a new vest.
customer_reviews.author: nicole smith

customer_reviews.title: ... different weighted vests and this is by far the best. It fits comfortably and distributes the weight perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different weighted vests and this is by far the best. It fits comfortably and distributes the weight perfectly. I wouldn't recommend running without a shirt as it can cause mild friction burns. Great weight, though I wish they had heavier options too.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Fox

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to add to my daily workouts
customer_reviews.text: I love my vest! I'm 5' 7", weight 138 pounds, and I'm in pretty good shape. So far I've used this in workouts including push-ups, burpees, box jumps, running, sprinting, using it w/my Maxi Climber, etc. and it has worked great. It has definitely added a new challenge to my workouts. So glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie K.

customer_reviews.title: Great weight vest, won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It’s made with quality material. l’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: untouchable_wow

customer_reviews.title: Beads Falling From Vest
customer_reviews.text: I received this product in September and used it for jogging and push ups. I was doing my push ups the other day and started hearing beads falling from it. Was happy with the product initially, but there is no reason for beads to be falling from it with such light usage.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie LaGrippo

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is MADE for comfort and inconspicuous and function. Didja get all dat? I wore this at a meeting. Trained with it(sparred)danced. Got to the house, forgot i had it on, and fell asleep. Nice
customer_reviews.author: Ellygis

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great until leaked
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug and was very happy until the beads started slowly falling out at the seam after 3 runs...
customer_reviews.author: Morski

customer_reviews.title: Ive always loved weighted vest
customer_reviews.text: Ive always loved weighted vest, after watching dbz and naruto as a kid i used to ware them a good amount of time. This isnt too heavy and not too big so they work great when wearing them under my work clothes for a nice work out at work, i work about 2 to 4 hours for a shift.
customer_reviews.author: Jab Jr

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed, will spill metal beads everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The material failed after wearing it only 3 weeks. May I ask for a replacement? My house is now full of steel beads that your vest is leaking... Please assist. Posted and still no respomse. Poor business paradiagm.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Poor quailty
customer_reviews.text: Elastic broke beads spilling out ... Contacted seller no solution :(
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent....
customer_reviews.text: I train my Muay Thai with this on. It stretches a bit but the weight is perfect and it is excellent for a vest. Stay on your toes never static knees baby!
customer_reviews.author: Redfeather Blackwolf

customer_reviews.title: it seems to be made for a mans chest and shoulder size
customer_reviews.text: its loose on my but i am 5:4 and dont have broad shouders. still that doesnt stop me from using it because it can be held down by my sports top when runing or working out. great weight and is pretty comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: fionna

customer_reviews.title: I have had to super glue twice
customer_reviews.text: The weight vest has holes in it. I have had to super glue twice. Not sure it's worth the money but my son is determined to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I work 10 hour shifts, and I wear it all the way through, totaling around 12 hours. It actually improves my posture and doesn't hinder my movement at all. Very well distributed. I do wear a compression shirt under it because I'm not sure about it being invontact with my skin for that long.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Adcox

customer_reviews.title: maxi,sport weighted vest
customer_reviews.text: The vest iz actually pretty descent I,m big guy and the vest fitz really tight no unnecessary movement. All n all I would purchase again....
customer_reviews.author: eddie h.

customer_reviews.title: Does not weigh the weight I ordered
customer_reviews.text: It arrived pretty quickly and packaged well. Per my scale, it does weigh 11 lbs vs the 12 lb I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my dad is very active and he really liked adding this to this home workout sessions!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this vest
customer_reviews.text: Really like this vest! I was trying to make my workouts more challenging and this does the trick. I read some reviews that say it leaks sand; however I have not experienced this. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Workout vest
customer_reviews.text: It is great for working out adds some good resistance. The weight amount is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice vest got the money. Fits nice. Satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Marine Vet Approved
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my run and my mma/boxing style workout. I 100% recommend this product to anyone trying to brake out of that shell called "Weakness"!

customer_reviews.title: I have used it for body weight exercises and light ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for body weight exercises and light jogging and it has been holding up quite well. It's only been about a month, so hopefully it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Overall good but on my petite frame it does move around ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall good but on my petite frame it does move around a bit thus causing chafing. Also better for short distant running as it starts hurting the shoulders 3 miles down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Chiquita Quintor

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This vest fits great, is durrable and is exactly what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Cardboard Box

customer_reviews.title: Good for burpees
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller then it is displayed but I like it rubbs a little but for the money it's a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This vest is perfect for adding a little challenge to your "body-weight" exercises
customer_reviews.text: Many of my workouts revolve around common calisthenic exercises. This vest is perfect for adding a little challenge to your "body-weight" exercises. I've also used it on short 7-mile hikes, underneath my pack, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: nmcc362

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight and fit for that extra burn
customer_reviews.text: Weight is just right for that little extra calorie burn. Fits very well and snug. No leaks so far as I can tell. You can feel the weight when you hold it, but not when you're wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: spencer yan

customer_reviews.title: Usage
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this item, and I wore today.... 20200627—confortable but a bit of backache at the end after 30-40min, I think it’s due to the lack of exercise.... Overall I like it, I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Habib Figueredo

customer_reviews.title: Weighted Vest Workouts
customer_reviews.text: Adding this to my workout... is a game changer. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love my vest
customer_reviews.text: Practically have been wear on every work out whether jogging, walking, sprinting, HIIT.
customer_reviews.author: gcam1970

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Started to rip after I used it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Cardin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: use it 2 time and starting to lose some of the beads already
customer_reviews.author: toua xiong

customer_reviews.title: Good size a I'm a 5'7" 180 lbs and it ...
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Good size a I'm a 5'7" 180 lbs and it fits good. I ran with it yesterday and had no issues. Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Urbina

customer_reviews.title: The Leakage!
customer_reviews.text: Poor craftsmanship stitching can't handle weight of vest if you run with it. They give way after a period of time and will leak out the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Coach A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It's easy to wear and exercise in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurts on the shoulders.
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomically fits well but I wish it had comfort pads of some kind on the shoulders. That would make ALL the difference in the world.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even know you’re wearing!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, form fit. Used for “Murph” workout and felt great!

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Mine is torn and the pebbles keep falling out , bad quality

customer_reviews.title: This vest worked well for about 6 months, and ...
customer_reviews.text: This vest worked well for about 6 months, and then some of the stitching started to come loose and spilling the weight-beads. Now, it's unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: great weight vest .
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived really fast. I wear this vest almost everyday for working out. You can't even tell you have it on.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: auwesome love it works good use to have a golds gym one wore it out this is way better

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: fits just right for my frame. I'm 5'5, about 41inch chest. I walk around with it on, ride my mountain bike, and etc. with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Carter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great vest! Definitely the best I've ever owned. Feels great and the design is perfect for CrossFit activities.
customer_reviews.author: Gator girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have truly enjoyed my Max weighted vest. A great workout tool.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great weight vest. It is exactly what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest but not adjustable weights so that kinda stinks
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great design it doesn't flop everywhere like other weight vest
customer_reviews.text: This little vest comes in handy when adding resistance to your calisthenics workout. Great design it doesn't flop everywhere like other weight vest. Now if they only had heavier versions of this model.
customer_reviews.author: TJHamilton

customer_reviews.title: good for military training
customer_reviews.text: Very help full, good for military training, also good for your hops in basket ball and helps u improve ur jogging such as sprint and running

customer_reviews.title: Delivered ahead of schedule,
customer_reviews.text: Delivered ahead of schedule, BUT the product has holes in it causing the sand grains to leak out when I jump or run

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: Just wore this today, one of the stitches broke causing the metal bbs inside to fall out.will never buy from this company again.

customer_reviews.title: Snug
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Doesn't slip. Nice and snug with minimal bounce. Hasn't torn yet.

customer_reviews.title: Weight vest
customer_reviews.text: The product has worked great for me I have it almost 2 years

customer_reviews.text: I love this weighted vest. It fits comfortably and stays in place. I purchased it two weeks ago and so far, I'm loving it!

customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear when working out at the gym or exercising at home. Helps with posture as well.

customer_reviews.text: Great. Use it about 3 times a week for long, steady cardio. Works as described. Recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Workout Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I love the extra challenge this vest adds to my workouts. best Workout accessory I have ever purchased .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the fit, the comfort is the best. What a surprise

customer_reviews.title: I like it, and recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It has really helped My workout it took it too another level, I like it,and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but its a little big and I'm a normal 5'9" male
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Brown

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice addition to a workout
customer_reviews.text: The vest tends to shift around while I'm working out. Other than that, it's a nice addition to a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a super hero in training
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vest. It's just the right amount of weight to challenge me during my walk or run. Obviously wearing anything of this nature is going to be a bit awkward but this is very compact and fits well so that it's not super noticeable. It even has a pouch in the back which I put my keys in, but it's not very secure so I probably wouldn't put anything bigger or heavier in there. The reflectors are a nice touch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest it's very fitted and doesn't move around when running
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: When running the vest tends to shift a lot and bounce a bit, I found myself re-adjusting it often.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS VEST
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS VEST! I know it may not fit the best (I am very tiny framed) so it kind of moves around. But for what you are paying, it is a GREAT tool for increasing endurance. I love wearing it on hikes as it is not too much weight but just enough to really ramp up the intensity of any body weight movement.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: If you are wanting to buy a durable weighted vest for running/cardio, be sure to get one that has pouches for weight bags - this vest has iron filaments contained within stitching and does not have pouches to add/remove weight bags - which began to fall apart after ~2 months. I didn't even use it daily. Used every other day for core-resistance training and once/week for running... Not useable anymore. I'd look for a best that contains removeable weight pouches. Will be more durable in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear it under business casual clothes to stress my body regularly. Very comfortable for my body shape. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Myers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic weighted vest to run in.
customer_reviews.text: Recently did a 2 mile run to see how this vest would do and I have to say I'm quite surprised. I was worried at first, as most people go for 8lbs for a weighted running vest, and when I received this, I was worried as well as it felt much heftier than other similar vests, but after running it's not that bad at all. Shoulder straps are padded well and do not leave your shoulders sore as the weight of the vest is distributed quite evenly on it. The straps give plenty of leeway for proper movement and doesn't feel like it constricts my chest or breathing at all. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Besides being a little big it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. It's one size fits all and a little big. When doing jumps it moves a lot. Wish I could adjust to make smaller. Besides being a little big it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Bedner

customer_reviews.title: It is excellent, has helped with endurance and speed
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent , has helped with endurance and speed. The bad thing is I wear muscle shirts so when running the vest rubs me on my bone by my neck and leaves it raw but I just use a regular T-shirt now
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine! I use it for running
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine! I use it for running, pushups, situps squats and pullups. Great way to add work to any workout when traveling and a gym isn't available. It may only be 12 lbs but just do more reps!
customer_reviews.author: def

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, fits well
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, fits well, though it moves a around a bit while performing excercises. No worries if you're working hard enough you'll forget about it. Also they got you on a lb, its 11 not 12 overall I want to give it a 3.5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the vest but the description didn't give the weight
customer_reviews.text: I like the vest but the description didn't give the weight... 12 lbs. I was looking for 6-8 lb vest instead.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

product_meta.title: Maxi Sport - Weight Vest By Maxi Climber
